spec_data.Name: perl-Text-Diff-Parser
spec_data.Description:
Text::Diff::Parser parses diff files and patches. It allows you to access
the changes to a file in a standardized way, even if multiple patch
formats are used.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:15:04 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Parse patch files containing unified and standard diffs
